name: Spire Maritime API
description: Satellite-based vessel tracking providing global AIS data, vessel positions, port events, and maritime analytics through GraphQL and REST APIs with real-time satellite coverage.

access_info.pricing_model: Free trial available, custom enterprise pricing based on data needs
access_info.rate_limits: Varies by plan, custom based on subscription

endpoints.description: Main GraphQL endpoint for vessel tracking, port events, and maritime data queries
endpoints.response_format: GraphQL JSON response with requested fields

endpoints.description: REST API for retrieving raw AIS messages (NMEA or decoded) with time-based filtering

research_notes.api_summary: Spire Maritime provides satellite-based vessel tracking with global AIS data coverage, port events, and maritime analytics through GraphQL and REST APIs. The platform offers real-time satellite updates and comprehensive maritime intelligence.

name: Windward Maritime Intelligence API
description: AI-powered maritime risk and intelligence platform providing vessel behavior analytics, sanctions screening, and predictive insights for maritime domain awareness.

access_info.pricing_model: Tiered pricing from API Insights Lab to Enterprise with custom solutions
access_info.rate_limits: Varies by tier, concurrent requests based on subscription

endpoints.description: Search vessels by various criteria including name, IMO, MMSI with risk insights
endpoints.response_format: JSON with vessel details and risk scores

endpoints.description: Get comprehensive risk assessment for specific vessels
Ocean freight visibility with ETA predictions and delay risks
endpoints.response_format: JSON with shipment status and predictions

research_notes.api_summary: Windward provides AI-powered maritime risk intelligence with vessel behavior analytics, sanctions screening, and predictive insights. The platform offers dark activity detection, ownership investigation, and real-time compliance alerts for maritime domain awareness.

name: Panjiva Global Trade API
description: Comprehensive global trade data platform providing import/export records, supply chain intelligence, and company relationships from 30+ countries with data back to 2007.

access_info.pricing_model: Tiered from Basic (1,000 calls/month) to Enterprise (unlimited)
access_info.rate_limits: 10 requests/second, monthly quota varies by plan

endpoints.description: Search global shipment records by company, product, or trade lane
endpoints.response_format: JSON with shipment records and metadata

endpoints.description: Get detailed company profile including trade activity and relationships
endpoints.response_format: JSON company profile with trade data

endpoints.description: Analyze trade trends for products, companies, or trade lanes
endpoints.response_format: JSON with time series trend data

content_summary.geographic_scope: 30+ countries including US, China, India, EU

research_notes.api_summary: Panjiva, part of S&P Global, provides comprehensive global trade data covering 30+ countries with historical data back to 2007. The platform offers import/export records, supply chain intelligence, and company relationships through REST APIs with JSON and CSV formats.

name: Import Genius Trade Intelligence API
description: US-focused trade intelligence platform providing detailed import/export records, competitive analysis, and supplier discovery tools with mobile app access.

access_info.rate_limits: 60 requests/minute, daily quota varies by plan

endpoints.description: Search import/export records by company, product, HS code, or keywords
Retrieve detailed company profile with trade history
Create monitoring alerts for companies or products

research_notes.api_summary: Import Genius specializes in US trade intelligence with detailed import/export records, competitive analysis, and supplier discovery. The platform offers 12 months of rolling US import data and 5 years of export data with mobile app access.

name: Enigma Public Data API
description: Comprehensive US business data platform providing enriched company profiles, financial health indicators, and public records intelligence via GraphQL and REST APIs.

access_info.rate_limits: Match: 50 req/sec, ID: 200 req/sec, latency: Match 609ms, ID 47ms

endpoints.description: Main GraphQL endpoint for flexible data queries on US businesses
Match and identify business profiles based on name, address, or other attributes
endpoints.response_format: JSON with matched business profiles and confidence scores

endpoints.description: Retrieve detailed business attributes and enriched data for a specific Enigma ID

research_notes.api_summary: Enigma Public provides comprehensive US business data through GraphQL and REST APIs, offering enriched company profiles, financial health indicators, and public records intelligence with high-performance endpoints and KYB compliance capabilities.
